Docs.summary: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintDriver> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueDriver%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "QueueDriver", not "PrintDriver" or "Queuedriver".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintDriver> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueDriver%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "QueueDriver", not "PrintDriver" or "Queuedriver".
